translations: [生物] 个体发生；[生物] 个体发生学

sentences.sentence: Bone measurement of human phylogeny and ontogeny of the various stages of bone size.
sentences.translation: 骨骼测量提供人类在系统发育和个体发育的各个阶段的骨骼尺寸。

sentences.sentence: The expression of TCR function depend on the gene rearrangement during ontogeny in nor-mal t cell.
sentences.translation: 细胞抗原受体(TCR)功能的表达有赖于该基因在正常T淋巴细胞发育过程中的重排。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion The neural stem cells isolated from different periods of ontogeny have different biological specificities.
sentences.translation: 结论个体发育不同阶段所得的神经干细胞有不同的生物学特性。
